idx.Description: The label value assigned to a voxel

description.Description: The anatomy described by this label value

red.Description: The suggested red value of the label color for visualization

green.Description: The suggested green value of the label color for visualization

blue.Description: The suggested blue value of the label color for visualization

alpha.Description: The suggested alpha value of the label color for visualization

tissue_type.Description: The type of tissue this label belongs to (used for partial volume correction) 0: unknown; 1: cortex; 2: subcortical grey matter; 3: white matter; 4: csf; 5: head
